familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former member of THC Barra Hotelaria LTDA, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and exists to hold license deals that are prospective, inactive, or otherwise do not currently have valuable assets or create income.

conflictDescription: TEST DESCRIPTION FOR THE CONFLICT (Friendly Name): Thc Barra Hotelaria
